islands_destinations.name: Saint Martin’s Island
islands_destinations.short_description: The only coral island of Bangladesh, famous for crystal-clear waters, coconut palms, and marine life.

islands_destinations.name: Nijhum Dwip
islands_destinations.short_description: A quiet island and wildlife sanctuary with deer herds, mangroves, and pristine beaches.

islands_destinations.name: Kutubdia Island
islands_destinations.short_description: Known for its historic lighthouse, wind farms, and peaceful sandy beaches.

islands_destinations.name: Sonadia Island
islands_destinations.short_description: An ecologically rich island with mangroves and a sanctuary for migratory birds and turtles.

islands_destinations.name: Moheshkhali Island
islands_destinations.short_description: A hilly island with salt fields, Adinath Temple, and scenic coastal views.

islands_destinations.name: Dublar Char
islands_destinations.short_description: A small island inside the Sundarbans, famous for the annual Rash Mela festival and fishing activities.
